wikipedia_page.main: Richard Terry Bates (born 17 June 1972) is a former English cricketer. Bates was a right-handed batsman who bowled right-arm off break. He was born in Stamford, Lincolnshire.

response: *Richard Bates (Medal of Honor) (1829–1889), U.S. Navy sailor and Medal of Honor recipient
